q: Are flood barriers recyclable at the end of their life?
a: Yes—aluminum, stainless steel, and EPDM gaskets are recyclable. 95 % of system mass returns to raw material cycles, reducing embodied carbon footprint.
Marine-grade aluminum for panels and 316 stainless for hardware. Both resist corrosion without toxic coatings and retain full recyclability.

q: Do recycled metals weaken barrier performance?
a: No—recycled aluminum billets meet ASTM B221 standards and perform identically to virgin material.

q: How should materials be disposed or repurposed?
a: Remove rubber seals, separate metals, and bring to certified recyclers. We provide a recycling sheet with every replacement order.
We use recycled cardboard and reusable corner protectors; no styrofoam. See environmental impact.
